name: Altitude Shift
description:
Altitude Shift is a 2.5D Twin-Stick Shooter. You must survive for as long as possible against an endless horde of enemies that are invading three separate layers. Rapidly swap between the layers to avoid attacks and prevent the enemies from capturing a layer. Losing a layer only makes the game harder, and if you lose all 3, the game is over.

Altitude Shift was developed over a semester under the Game Design and Development degree at the University of Colorado Colorado Springs. Development is planned to continue over summer.
